detail_desc: Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a double-layered, wrapover hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Hat in braided paper straw with ears on top, embroidery and sequins on the front and a spotted grosgrain band. Width of brim 4 cm.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck with gathers at the top, and gathers in the sides for a more comfortable fit.

Block-coloured T-shirt in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Boxy style in a relaxed fit with a small embroidery detail at the top and ribbing around the neckline. The cotton content of the T-shirt is organic.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons down the front and patch front pockets. Detachable D-ring belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Jersey-lined joggers in a cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Skirt in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front pockets and a raw-edge flounce at the hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Blouse in woven fabric with a flounce at the top, long, cuffed sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Round, gold-coloured button at the top and cuffs.
Waist belt of imitation leather straps with a decorative knot at the front, and elastic straps at the back with a metal fastener. Width approx. 3.5 cm.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front. Front pockets, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set in an airy, organic cotton weave. Wrapover dress with flutter sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist, concealed press-stud and decorative bow at one side and a flared skirt. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and narrow elastication and a small frill trim around the legs.
Fully lined twill 5-pocket trousers in a cotton blend with an adjustable elasticated waist and detachable fabric belt. Jersey lining.
Baby Exclusive. Tights in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the tights is organic.
Dungaree dress in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with crossover straps that can be adjusted with press-studs at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist and a flared skirt.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cropped, fitted top in crinkled jersey with broderie anglaise. Sweetheart neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Round neckline with decorative gathers, and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide, elbow-length raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Satin sandals with a decorative bow at the front, an adjustable ankle strap and wedge heels. Imitation leather and fabric linings, satin insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 9.5 cm.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with an all-over print. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and a pair of shorts in organic cotton. Jersey bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Bolero in soft, pointelle-knit cotton with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. No buttons.

Set with a top, pair of leggings and hairband in soft cotton. Top in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a yoke with a frill at the front that continues over the shoulders. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in patterned jersey with a decorative bow at the front.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with a lined front that gives the bust a natural shape and provides light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, no fasteners and an elastic hem.
Fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Short dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and short sleeves with a tie detail. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a motif. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a button placket. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Single-breasted coat in sturdy bouclé made from a wool blend with notch lapels, a welt pocket at the top, diagonal side pockets and one inner pocket. Single back vent. Lined.
Wide, tailored trousers in a sturdy wool weave with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.

Fitted, quilted, lightweight jacket with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers. Supplied with a practical storage bag with an elasticated drawstring. Size of bag 11x24.5 cm.
Braided leather sandals with an adjustable heel strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill containing some lyocell. Regular waist, a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets with a flap. Slim legs with seams at the knees.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist, a pleated skirt and laser-cut hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs.
Soft slippers with elastication around the top, fabric linings and insoles and imitation suede soles.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved jumper in rib-knit cotton with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, decorative buttons down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized, one-shoulder, rib-knit jumper in a cotton blend with an asymmetric cut at the top and long dolman sleeves.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps and a zip in one side. Chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Ballerina trainers with a wide, glittery elastic strap over the foot, a padded edge and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey and a dungaree dress in woven fabric. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Dress with a press-stud at one side, adjustable shoulder straps with press-studs, and front pockets.
Fitted top in soft jersey with a round neck and long puff sleeves.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a faceted sparkly button at the top and long sleeves.
Fitted dress in sturdy jersey with lace details in a narrow cut at the top with a deep neckline and cut-out section at the back. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jersey top with short, printed cap sleeves and gathered flounces at the hem.
V-neck top in ribbed jersey made from a soft modal and cotton blend with spaghetti shoulder straps.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow ties at the sides and a high cut at the back.

Calf-length dress in an airy, broderie anglaise cotton weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top and short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems. Seam at the waist with narrow ties at one side and a flared, tiered skirt. Lined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Long shirt woven in a linen blend with a collar, chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Dress in slub cotton jersey with a print motif, short flounced sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.

Kangol x H&M. Knee-length, padded jacket with a stand-up collar, padded hood, two-way zip down the front and welt pockets at the top. Long sleeves, one with the Kangol logo at the top, and concealed elastication at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
V-neck tunic in woven fabric with buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Hair clips in coloured plastic.
Pyjama top and leggings in soft jersey. Top with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and short, elasticated balloon sleeves. Double-layered yoke and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sandals with wide, crossover straps at the front and an elasticated heel strap. Imitation leather insoles.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with an elasticated waist, pleats and a rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved jumper in soft, rib-knit organic cotton with buttons at the back of the neck and block-coloured sections.
Wide trousers in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with covered elastication and sewn-in tie belt at the waist, and front pockets.
Metal earrings in various designs decorated with sparkly beads in plastic and glass. One pair of hoops and 24 pairs of studs. Size from 0.2 cm to 4 cm.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
Earrings with plastic beads and tassels. Length 8.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
T-shirt in soft jersey with appliqués on the front.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and short slits in the hems.
